org.apache.flink.yarn

类 YarnClusterClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.client.program.ClusterClient
      • org.apache.flink.yarn.YarnClusterClient

  • public class YarnClusterClient
extends org.apache.flink.client.program.ClusterClient
    Java representation of a running Flink cluster within YARN.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • YarnClusterClient

        public YarnClusterClient(AbstractYarnClusterDescriptor clusterDescriptor,
                         org.apache.hadoop.yarn.client.api.YarnClient yarnClient,
                         org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.ApplicationReport appReport,
                         org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration flinkConfig,
                         org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path sessionFilesDir,
                         boolean newlyCreatedCluster)
                  throws IOException,
                         org.apache.hadoop.yarn.exceptions.YarnException
        Create a new Flink on YARN cluster.
        参数:
        clusterDescriptor - The descriptor used at cluster creation
        yarnClient - Client to talk to YARN
        appReport - the YARN application ID
        flinkConfig - Flink configuration
        sessionFilesDir - Location of files required for YARN session
        newlyCreatedCluster - Indicator whether this cluster has just been created
        抛出:
        IOException
        org.apache.hadoop.yarn.exceptions.YarnException
